item.title: Leishmania is the causative agent of the tropical neglected disease leishmaniasis and infects macrophages as its definitive host cell . In order to sustain and propagate infections, Leishmania parasites have to complete cycles of exit and re-infection. Yet, the mechanism driving the parasite spread to other cells remains unclear.
